message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $130. I think you'll find it's a great deal at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we split the difference and settle at $125?
I'm getting close, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. Would you be willing to go a bit lower?
Bob, I'm trying to be fair here.  $120 is my final offer. What do you say?
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $118?
